§ 3062. Regulations The Secretary of Defense is required by section 2202 of this title to prescribe regulations governing the performance within the Department of Defense of the procurement functions, and related functions, of the Department of Defense. (Added Pub. L. 116–283, div. A, title XVIII, § 1807(b)(1), Jan. 1, 2021, 134 Stat. 4157; amended Pub. L. 117–81, div. A, title XVII, § 1701(b)(2)(A), (j), Dec. 27, 2021, 135 Stat. 2132, 2143.)
Editorial Notes Prior ProvisionsA prior section 3062 was renumbered section 7062 of this title.
Amendments2021—Pub. L. 117–81, § 1701(j), amended text of section enacted by Pub. L. 116–283, § 1807(b)(1), by substituting “is required by section 2202 of this title to prescribe” for “shall prescribe”. Pub. L. 117–81, § 1701(b)(2)(A), amended directory language of Pub. L. 116–283, § 1807(b)(1), which enacted this section.
